results.title: PSG Club World Cup reunion with Messi recalls unhappier times
results.description: 'He seemed to have as much desire to play in Ligue 1 as he did to go to the dentist,' wrote journalist Vincent Duluc.

results.title: Kaizer Chiefs agree deal for signing number SIX!
results.description: Kaizer Chiefs are beginning to make a lot of moves in the current transfer window with the side set to jet off to Europe for pre-season soon

results.title: Eskom to implement 12-hour power outage in Gauteng on Tuesday
results.description: Eskom will be conducting critical maintenance on its distribution network resulting in a 12-hour power outage on Tuesday, 2 July.
